title: 祝各位圣诞节快乐
author: 麒麟BOSS
txt_content: {:10_513:}叮叮当,叮叮当,铃儿响的当。 {:10_492:}Hi Everybody is good, I am kylin BOSS, today is the Christmas day I wish you a merry Christmas! I wish kylin family a merry christmas!   大家好，我是麒麟BOSS，今天圣诞节祝各位圣诞节快乐!祝麒麟世家圣诞节快乐!    祝大家腰好腿好身体好.......祝各位年年有条咸鱼吃，万事如意,福如东海. [qq]1679937404[/qq]  ...........发错了     下面这个看你们要看还是不看.....   麒麟世家祝各位圣诞节快乐 QQ305858224

replies.txt_content: 于是你特此机智的水了一贴吗

replies.author: 乾天
replies.txt_content: 嗯~楼主圣诞节快乐~大家圣诞节快乐~

replies.author: 麒麟BOSS
replies.txt_content: Thank you, wish you a merry Christmas and a happy play!

replies.author: 末影矿工
replies.txt_content:
麒麟BOSS 发表于 2014-12-25 20:36
Chinese really warm wish you a merry Christmas
喜闻乐见Chinese，喜闻乐见没有Be动词，喜闻乐见没有主语

replies.txt_content: Chinese really warm wish you a merry Christmas

replies.txt_content: 圣诞节快乐    Merry Christmas I wish you happy playing
